dcterms:creator: Helmut Fuchs
Valerie Gailus-Durner
dcterms:description: A dataset containing averaged auditory brainstem response (ABR) raw data from mutant and wildtype mice, generated as part of a large-scale phenotyping effort at the German Mouse Clinic.
dcterms:title: GMC dataset

dcterms:creator: Neil J. Ingham
Selina A. Pearson
Valerie E. Vancollie
dcterms:description: A large dataset of auditory brainstem response (ABR) data from over 9,000 mice, including single-gene mutant lines and respective control mice, used to identify genes associated with hearing loss.
dcterms:title: ING data set
